title: காந்தியையும், அவரை சுட்ட கோட்சேவையும் கும்பிடும் மோடி?- புது விதமாக பரவும் வதந்தி
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Among those imprisoned at Cellular Jail was the great Veer Savarkar. I visited the cell where the indomitable Veer Savarkar was lodged. Rigorous imprisonment did not dampen Veer Savarkar’s spirits and he continued to speak and write about a free India from jail too. pic.twitter.com/dbsyzuVUjA
